lines.text:
[after seeing a court servant die from drinking poison]
Somehow I've lost my desire for wine.
[he pours his wine out onto the floor]

[seductively]
I can grant your most secret desire.

[pinned under fallen beam]
There's no pain at all. Funny, I... I... I wanted so much, but I die without getting anything.

[to Darios]
I imagine soldiering is not a simple job, especially when you have to play the hero all day.
It'd be too easy for him.
It's a waste of time to try to get anything out of these jackals. See that they're all kept in chains while I go and prepare for their execution.
